head.title: COVID-19 Resources - NSBSD

meta.content: Voice of the Arctic has created a special section on their website with North Slope COVID-19 related resources. The tab will include emergency orders and resources available to North Slope residents spending more time at home along with local, state and federal legislative updates.

nav.div: NSBSD » News » District News » COVID-19 Resources

img.p: Voice of the Arctic has created a special section on their website with North Slope COVID-19 related resources. The tab will include emergency orders and resources available to North Slope residents spending more time at home along with local, state and federal legislative updates.

p.a: Click here for an external link to view Voice of the Arctic's COVID resource page.

div.div: 829 Aivik St, Utqiagvik, AK 99723 | Phone (907) 852-5311 | Fax (907) 852-9506
